item.title: Bee'ah and Chinook Sciences have announced the first waste-to-hydrogen project in the Middle East
item.description: Dedicated to zero-waste cities and clean energy, Bee’ah, a leader in sustainability, revealed its plan for the UAE’s first waste-to-hydrogen project. Source: PRNewsfoto/Chinook Sciences, Beeâ€™ah. The decision to move forward with the waste-to-hydrogen project was reached during a signing ceremony attended by Chinook Sciences Chairman and CEO, Dr Rifat Chalabi (front left), HE Salim Al Owais (front right), Chairman of Bee’ah, and representatives from both organizations. This project, a collaboration with UK-based industrial renewable fuel and environmental technology firm Chinook Sciences, encompasses a green hydrogen production facility and a hydrogen vehicle refueling station.
